column1: 7 holiday Weather day is   holiday or not
9 workingday Working Day: If day is neither weekend nor holiday is 1

column10: 4: Heavy Rain + Ice Pallets +   Thunderstorm + Mist

column1: 11 temp Normalized temperature in Celsius. The values are derived via (t-t_min)/(t_max-t_min)
12 atemp Normalized   feeling temperature in Celsius. The values are derived via   (t-t_min)/(t_max-t_min)
13 hum Normalized humidity. The values are divided to 100 (max)
14 windspeed Normalized wind speed. The values are divided to 67 (max)
17 cnt Count of total rental bikes including both casual and registered
